explains: n. <正式>预测器，预示物；预言者

sentences.en: Opinion polls are an unreliable predictor of election outcomes.
sentences.cn: 用民意测验来预测选举结果并不可靠。

sentences.en: Cholesterol level is not a strong predictor of heart disease in women.
sentences.cn: 胆固醇含量不能有效地预示妇女心脏病。

sentences.en: In fact, personality is not the best predictor of who does it well.
sentences.cn: 事实上，性格并不能很好地预测谁会完成得更好。
